cause.description:
Stop the fur industry and prevent the torture of animals across the globe. Anal electrocution and skin being ripped from the still conscious animal are just two of the countless tortures inflicted on them.
The selling and production of fur MUST be STOPPED.
1. Stop the production of fur worldwide
2. Stop and prevent the torture and unmerciful killings of animals
3. Animals have rights and should not be subject to torture for another's vanity
cause.mission: Stop the selling of fur and prevent the torture and unnecessary killing of animals
cause.name: Stop the Fur industry
